value.title: LG Makes Strategic Investment in Bear Robotics
value.excerpt: LG Electronics invests $60 million in Bear Robotics, betting on the growth of autonomous service robots and its roadmap for Software-defined Robotics.

value.title: Mountain View robot security company partners with Canadian company
value.excerpt: "The Autonomous Security Drones can be programmed to patrol specific areas, follow predetermined routes, or be dispatched to investigate alarms," Knightscope said in a statement.

value.title: ABB Opens Revamped Robotics Center in Michigan Amid Growing Demand for AI Robots

value.title: This Robot is Borrowing OpenAI’s Magic to Make At-Home Droids Feel Real
value.excerpt: Figure showed off a demo of its humanoid robot that adopts OpenAI’s large language models to help it understand its environment and complex requests.

value.title: In the First Trailer for Netflix's Atlas, Jennifer Lopez Gets in the Damn Robot
value.excerpt: Jennifer Lopez. Directed by Brad Peyton, the sci-fi action film brings us Lopez in bombastic badass mode—clad in a mech suit as she jumps right into battle against the futuristic, war-torn backdrop of an unknown dystopia.

value.title: New Study Claims AI, Robots, New Tech in Workplace Deteriorates Quality of Life
value.excerpt: A United Kingdom study of nearly 5000 workers reportedly found that AI, robots, trackers, and other new technology are bad for people's well-being while laptops, computers, and other long-established technologies prove to improve people's health.

value.title: New AI, Robotics, Spacetech And Fintech Unicorns Trot Onto The Unicorn Board In February
value.excerpt: Ten new unicorns added more than $18 billion in value to The Crunchbase Unicorn Board in February, but one company was also downgraded from unicorn status and fell off the board.

value.title: Elon Musk says his AI startup xAI will open-source its Grok chatbot
value.excerpt: Musk sued ChatGPT-maker OpenAI and its CEO Sam Altman, saying they had abandoned the startup's original mission to develop artificial intelligence for the benefit of humanity and not for profit.

value.title: Glacier is training AI-powered recycling robots

value.title: Litter-Robot 4 Vs. 3 Connect: Which Automatic Litter Box Should You Get?
value.excerpt: the Litter-Robot 4 is an upgraded version of the Litter-Robot 3 Connect, with advanced safety sensors, a more sophisticated (and quieter) sifting system and better odor control. I have both models in my home and my three cats use each one regularly.

value.title: DeepMind and Stanford’s new robot control model follow instructions from sketches

value.title: 5 AI Predictions For The Year 2030
value.excerpt: Agents are AI systems that can complete loosely defined tasks: say, planning and booking your upcoming trip. AGI refers to an artificial intelligence system that meets or exceeds human capabilities on every dimension. When people envision the state of AI in 2030, agents and/or AGI are often front and center.

value.title: Male AI robot appears to grope female reporter during interview at tech expo
value.excerpt: An AI robot called Muhammad touched a female reporter’s backside during a Saudi Arabia tech expo. The android acted ‘independently without direct human control.’

value.title: AI startup Hugging Face is looking into open-source robotics
value.excerpt: Artificial intelligence startup Hugging Face Inc., best known for operating a hub for hosting open-source machine learning and AI models, is launching a new project focused on robotics under the direction of former Tesla Inc. staff scientist Remi Cadene.

value.title: Reshape Automation aims to reduce barriers of robotics adoption

value.title: Hugging Face is launching an open source robotics project led by former Tesla scientist
value.excerpt: Remi Cadene's move signals an ambitious expansion for Hugging Face, which until now, has primarily focused on software, not hardware.

value.title: The Integral Role Of Robotics, AI And Automation In Healthcare
value.excerpt: With the advent of robotics, automation and artificial intelligence (AI), we are not merely witnessing a change in how healthcare is delivered; we are at the dawn of a new era where the boundaries of what is possible are being redefined.

value.title: This Startup Figures the Best Way to Control Drones Is Talking to Them
value.excerpt: Connecticut-based Primordial Labs has developed a voice-based interface for small UAVs. A soldier simply speaks into a radio and tells the drone what to do.

value.title: Learn about generative AI’s impact on robotics at the Robotics Summit & Expo
value.excerpt: Researchers are already using generative AI to make robots faster learners, and a summit panel will discuss how it can be applied at scale.
